attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!
attributes.review:
Absolutely worst app! I would NOT recommend to anyone! I decided to download this stupid app so that I can be more uneducated and an idiot. All my other fellow trump supporters seemed to be getting more dumb from this app and I knew this is the one I needed to download. DO NOT DOWNLOAD! This app will give you parasites in your brain. I swear I was only reading a couple of laws he was trying to pass and overall just news he was placing on there and I noticed it was crazy... I might be just over thinking but I’m starting to think that he doesn’t know what he’s doing? This app is rotting my brain😡 am I becoming liberal ???? 😭😭😭 someone help me. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APPPPP!!!!!! I’m telling you this is terrible! I am warning you please don’t. I am scared for my life! I’m starting to think everyone is human and wanting to treat them equally.. 

Besides that I also wanted to educate you guys on how terribly the app is made! The app kept glitching and kicking me out of the app! It was very annoying. This whole app was frustrating! I had to call the cops because the app kept trying to take my phone number🤬 they said they couldn’t do anything! What the hell is that!!!! I’m starting to think that blue lives don’t matter! MAYBE WE SHOULD DEFUND THEM! I am a white cis man! I am a priority! They shouldn’t be treating me like that! 

See!!! The liberal thinking is taking over my mind!!! Uugggghhhhhhhh! Just take my word and don’t download this terrible, dreadful, god awful, appalling, horrific and horrendous app!
